Member.Name: Unit
Member.Description: Unit of measure of the parameter

AddOnInstructionDefinition.Name: WaterCircuit
AddOnInstructionDefinition.Description: Closed water circuit based on Micro820

Parameter.Name: Reset
Parameter.Description: Reset WTU C1&C2 on falling edge of reset signal

Parameter.Name: C1_Kc
Parameter.Description:
Proportional and Integral are dependent on this gain. (>= 0.0001).
Increasing Kc improves response time but also increases overshoot and oscillation of the PID.

Parameter.Name: C1_Ti
Parameter.Description:
Time integral constant in seconds (>= 0.0001).
Increasing Ti decreases the overshoot and oscillation of the PID.

Parameter.Name: C1_Td
Parameter.Description:
Time derivative constant in seconds (>= 0.0).
When Td equals 0, there is no derivative action and PID becomes a PI controller.
Increasing Td reduces the overshot and removes the oscillation of the PID controller.

Parameter.Name: C1_FC
Parameter.Description:
Filter constant (>= 0.0). Recommended range for FC is 0 to 20.
Increasing FC smooths the response of the PID controller.

Routine.Name: Logic
Routine.Description: Closed water circuit based on Micro820

STContent.Line: // Closed water circuit based on Micro820
MSG(Msg_Read); // Message to read object. CIP datatable read.
MSG(Msg_Write); // Message to Write object. CIP datatable write.
